rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0001
rows.name:
Meleph... Is Superbian army still
digging up Aeshma?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0002
rows.name:
No... I believe the excavation has been
put on hold ever since the incident.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0003
rows.name: Still many Superbians here though...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0004
rows.name: Why not go home to Empire?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0005
rows.name:
If we were to leave the site unguarded,
Iira could misuse the artifacts again.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0006
rows.name:
Even if we were to re-bury what has
been excavated so far, there's no
guarantee the same won't happen.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0007
rows.name:
So we're maintaining jurisdiction
over the site for the time being.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0008
rows.name:
To ensure they don't fall into the wrong
hands, we've bolstered the garrison and
brought in a Divine Beast battleship too.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0009
rows.name: Makes much sense.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0010
rows.name: Tora want to check out Aeshma!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0011
rows.name:
Never seen weapons from Judicium
before. Very interesting technology.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0012
rows.name: My apologies, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0013
rows.name:
Our treaty with the Kingdom of Invidia
will not allow it.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0014
rows.name:
We have agreed not to investigate,
research or use Aeshma in any form.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0015
rows.name: Meh-meh!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0016
rows.name: But when you making such promise?!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0017
rows.name: At the Superbia-Invidia summit.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0018
rows.name:
Superbia take big penalty
for almost starting war?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0019
rows.name: That's about right, yes.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0020
rows.name: What Tora ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0021
rows.name: You pay Invidia big fine too?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0022
rows.name: You give Invidia Tasty Sausages?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0023
rows.name: You make other promises?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0101
rows.name:
We didn't end up paying monetary
compensation, but it was a possibility.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0102
rows.name:
If we had, it would likely have come to
around 40 billion G.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0103
rows.name: Much expensive!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0104
rows.name:
Could make 1,000 Hanas
with that money.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0105
rows.name: Wow, you're surprisingly expensive too.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0106
rows.name: Eheheh!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0107
rows.name:
If not money, what did Meleph
country pay?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0201
rows.name: That just what Masterpon would want.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0202
rows.name:
If you pay in sausages, how
many years supply it take?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0203
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0204
rows.name:
About a billion years' worth,
I suppose.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0205
rows.name:
You just made up a large number
because you couldn't be bothered
to calculate, didn't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0206
rows.name: What did Meleph country pay then?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0301
rows.name: Very sharp, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0302
rows.name:
Must have been forced to hand over
all Superbia technologies!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0303
rows.name:
That would be unreasonably harsh...
No, it was a different request.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0304
rows.name: Masterpon not so sharp after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0305
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh...

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0401
rows.name:
They asked for the rights to survey
Temperantia.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0402
rows.name: Why they want that?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0403
rows.name:
Well, as a buffer zone. But we managed
to dig up that Judician Divine Beast weapon,
didn't we?

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0404
rows.name:
Perhaps they thought Temperantia
would still have other such weapons
buried within it.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0405
rows.name:
Invidia would love to get hold of
some of this ordnance.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0406
rows.name:
Surely, it would be an
awesome deterrent.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0407
rows.name: Yes... And, a protection for the nation.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0408
rows.name: Ahhh, such boring geopolitics.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0409
rows.name:
Tora not care about any of that.
Just want to tinker with Divine Beast weapon
freely on his own.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0410
rows.name: Haha... I'm sure you do.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0411
rows.name:
If only we and Invidia were as
simple to deal with as you, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0412
rows.name:
Indeed. I envy you that
simplicity of mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0413
rows.name:
Masterpon.
They calling you simple idiot.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0414
rows.name: Tora never hear word idiot!

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0415
rows.name:
Hmph. Now Tora go steal advanced
Judicium tech and use to upgrade
Hana's respect for Masterpon.

rows.label: kizunatalk019_msg0416
rows.name: Don't do that. Please.
